description: Friendly explorers will visit the village.
An additional villager can live at this village.
Villages can be asked to forage nearby resources, refine wood, refine stone, or compost
Villages can be asked to cook, extract seeds, or tend dirt plots.
Villages assigned to woodcutting will produce more wood types
Rarer explorers will visit this village
Villages gain bonus health and defense.
Villages can be asked to smelt metal, refine textiles, and collect gems.
Villages assigned to stonecutting will produce more stone types.
Villages can gift unique new recipes.
NPCs in this village can forage resources from other biomes. Woodcutters will also produce more wood types, and stonecutters will produce more stone types.
